entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
